artist: Designer: Deidrich Diekmann; Manufacturer: J. & E. Stevens Company, Cromwell, Connecticut, 1843-1950s
description: circular building with small windows on front side and latticework screens on back side of building; green door with edges in the form of petals with red dome on top; small person sits below dome
inscription:
Inscription and Sticker

on green roof on front side, inscribed: [PAT. JANR. 27. 1874]
title: "Cupola" mechanical bank
